trans-unit.source: Represents a column of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coluna de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewComboBoxColumn class is a specialized type of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> used to logically host cells that enable users to select values from a list of choices.
trans-unit.target: A classe de DataGridViewComboBoxColumn é um tipo especializado de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>utilizado para logicamente as células de anfitrião que permitem aos utilizadores selecionar os valores de uma lista de opções.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: A DataGridViewComboBoxColumn has an associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> in every <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> that intersects it.
trans-unit.target: Um DataGridViewComboBoxColumn tem um associada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>em cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>intersetar que o mesmo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>

trans-unit.source: You can populate the cells manually by setting their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Pode preencher as células manualmente definindo as respetivas <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can bind the column to the data source indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Em alternativa, é possível vincular a coluna para a origem de dados indicada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is bound to a database table, set the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A> property to the name of a column in the table.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>está vinculada a uma tabela de base de dados, defina a coluna <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A>propriedade para o nome de uma coluna na tabela.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is bound to a collection of objects, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A> property to the name of an object property.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>está vinculado a uma coleção de objetos, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A>propriedade para o nome de uma propriedade do objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: You can populate the column drop-down list manually by adding values to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: É possível preencher a coluna na lista pendente manualmente adicionando os valores para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.Items%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can bind the drop-down list to its own data source by setting the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Em alternativa, é possível vincular na lista pendente a sua própria origem de dados através da definição da coluna <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the values are objects in a collection or records in a database table, you must also set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Se os valores são objetos de uma coleção ou registos numa tabela da base de dados, também tem de definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> property indicates which object property or database column provides the values that are displayed in the drop-down list.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>propriedade indica que coluna de base de dados ou de propriedade do objeto fornece os valores que são apresentados na lista pendente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> property indicates which object property or database column is used to set the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>propriedade indica que coluna de base de dados ou de propriedade do objeto é utilizada para definir a célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: One typical scenario is to bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control to a parent database table and bind the drop-down list to a related child table.
trans-unit.target: Um cenário típico é para vincular o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlar a uma tabela de base de dados principal e vincule na lista pendente para uma tabela de secundários relacionados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control to an `Orders` table that contains a `ProductID` column and set the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A> property to a `Products` table that contains `ProductID` and `ProductName` columns.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode vincular a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlar para um `Orders` tabela que contém um `ProductID` a coluna de conjunto de colunas e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>propriedade para um `Products` tabela que contém `ProductID` e `ProductName` colunas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: In this case, you would set the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A> property to "ProductID" to populate its cell values from the `Orders.ProductID` column.
trans-unit.target: Neste caso, iria definir a coluna <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A>propriedade como "ProductID" para preencher os valores de célula do `Orders.ProductID` coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DataPropertyName%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, to display the actual product names in the cells and the drop-down list, you would map these values to the `Products` table by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> property to "ProductID" and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> property to "ProductName".
trans-unit.target: No entanto, para visualizar os nomes de produto real em células e na lista pendente, teria de mapear estes valores para o `Products` tabela definindo a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>propriedade como "ProductID" e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>propriedade como "ProductName".</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: The drop-down list values (or the values indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> property) must include the actual cell values or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Os valores na lista pendente (ou os valores indicados pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>propriedade) tem de incluir os valores das células real ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo irá gerar uma exceção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> properties automatically sets the corresponding properties of all cells in the column including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Definir a coluna <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>propriedades define automaticamente as propriedades correspondentes de todas as células na coluna incluindo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override these property values for specific cells, set the column property first, and then set the cell properties.
trans-unit.target: Para ignorar estes valores de propriedade de células específicas, defina primeiro a propriedade de coluna e, em seguida, definir as propriedades de célula.

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> does not have <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Ao contrário do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>controlo, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>não tem <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: Instead, selecting a value from a drop-down list sets the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, a seleção de um valor numa lista pendente define a célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default sort mode for this column type is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.
trans-unit.target: O modo de ordenação predefinido para este tipo de coluna é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn"></xref> class to the default state.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn"> </xref> classe para o estado predefinido.

trans-unit.source: When initializing a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn> instance, this constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> instance.
trans-unit.target: Quando a inicializar uma nova <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn>define este construtor de instância, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>propriedade para um novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>instância.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether cells in the column will match the characters being entered in the cell with one from the possible selections.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se células na coluna corresponderão aos caracteres introduzidos na célula com uma das selecções possíveis.

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.AutoComplete%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Obter ou definir esta propriedade obtém ou define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.AutoComplete%2A>propriedade do objeto devolvido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.AutoComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.AutoComplete%2A> property of every cell in the column.
trans-unit.target: Definição desta propriedade também define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.AutoComplete%2A>a propriedade de cada célula da coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.AutoComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para as células individuais, defina os valores das células depois de definir o valor de coluna.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if auto completion is activated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se estiver ativado conclusão automática; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>propriedade é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template used to create cells.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o modelo utilizado para criar células.

trans-unit.source: The constructor for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn> class initializes this property to a newly created <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>.
trans-unit.target: O construtor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn>classe inicializa esta propriedade para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> criado recentemente</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Changing the properties of the cell template will not immediately affect the user interface (UI) of the column's existing cells.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Alterar as propriedades do modelo de célula não imediatamente afetará a interface de utilizador (IU) das células da coluna existente.

trans-unit.source: These changes are only apparent after the column is regenerated (for example, by sorting the column or through a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method).
trans-unit.target: Estas alterações são aparente apenas depois da coluna é novamente gerada (por exemplo, ao ordenar a coluna ou através de uma chamada para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that all other cells in the column are modeled after.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> que todos os outras células na coluna estão modeladas após.

trans-unit.source: The default value is a new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é um novo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When setting this property to a value that is not of type <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Quando definir esta propriedade para um valor que não é do tipo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this column.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia exata desta coluna.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to duplicate a column of cells.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método para duplicar uma coluna de células.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the cloned <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que representa o clonado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data source that populates the selections for the combo boxes.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a origem de dados que preenche as selecções para caixas de combinação.

trans-unit.source: The DataSource or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.Items%2A> properties specify where to retrieve the selection data shown in the combo box drop-down list.
trans-unit.target: A origem de dados ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.Items%2A>Propriedades especifique onde pretende obter os dados de seleção apresentados na lista pendente de caixa de combinação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: When using the DataSource property, if the data must be drawn from a nondefault property or column, then the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> property must be set to the name of the nondefault property or column.
trans-unit.target: Ao utilizar a propriedade de origem de dados, se os dados tem de ser desenhados de uma propriedade não predefinida ou uma coluna, em seguida, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>propriedade deve ser definida para o nome da propriedade não predefinidas ou coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the DataSource property is set to a string array, then <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> do not need to be set because each string in the array will be used for both value and display.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade DataSource está definida como uma matriz de cadeia, em seguida, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>não precisam de ser definida porque cada cadeia na matriz vai ser utilizada para o valor e apresentar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DataSource%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Obter ou definir esta propriedade obtém ou define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DataSource%2A>propriedade do objeto devolvido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DataSource%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Definição desta propriedade também define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DataSource%2A>apresentar a coluna de propriedade de cada célula na coluna e as atualizações.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para as células individuais, defina os valores das células depois de definir o valor de coluna.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents a data source.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que representa uma origem de dados.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>propriedade é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string that specifies the property or column from which to retrieve strings for display in the combo boxes.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma cadeia que especifica a propriedade ou coluna a partir da qual pode obter cadeias para apresentação nas caixas de combinação.

trans-unit.source: The data for the values stored in a column of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> objects is obtained from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Os dados para os valores armazenados numa coluna de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>objetos é obtida <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>

trans-unit.source: If this data comes from a nondefault property or column, then the DisplayMember property must be set to the necessary property name or column name.
trans-unit.target: Se estes dados for proveniente de uma propriedade não predefinida ou uma coluna, a propriedade de DisplayMember deve ser definida para o nome da propriedade necessária ou o nome de coluna.

trans-unit.source: If the cell values are internal values not visible to the user, then use DisplayMember and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> to map the internal cell values to user-viewable values.
trans-unit.target: Se os valores das células são valores internos não é visíveis para o utilizador, em seguida, utilize DisplayMember e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>para mapear os valores das células interno para valores de utilizador podem ser visualizados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A> property is set to a string array, the DisplayMember property does not need to be set because each string in the array will be used as a valid display string and as a valid underlying value.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>propriedade está definida como uma matriz de cadeia, a propriedade DisplayMember tem de ser definida porque cada cadeia na matriz vai ser utilizada como uma cadeia de apresentação válido e como um valor válido de subjacente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayMember%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Obter ou definir esta propriedade obtém ou define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayMember%2A>propriedade do objeto devolvido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayMember%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Definição desta propriedade também define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayMember%2A>apresentar a coluna de propriedade de cada célula na coluna e as atualizações.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para as células individuais, defina os valores das células depois de definir o valor de coluna.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that specifies the name of a property or column in the data source specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource*> property.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que especifica o nome de uma propriedade ou coluna na origem de dados especificada no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>propriedade é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines how the combo box is displayed when not editing.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que determina a forma como a caixa de combinação é apresentada quando não a editar.

trans-unit.source: The DisplayStyle property affects the appearance of cells in the column when they are not in edit mode, and regardless of whether they are read-only.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade DisplayStyle afeta o aspecto das células na coluna quando são não em modo de edição e independentemente de estarem só de leitura.

trans-unit.source: When a cell is in edit mode, it always looks like a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> control.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma célula está no modo de edição, sempre aspeto que tem um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly%2A> property value is `false`, the DisplayStyle property affects all cells in the column; otherwise, the DisplayStyle property affects only the current cell.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly%2A>valor da propriedade é `false`, a propriedade DisplayStyle afeta todas as células na coluna; caso contrário, a propriedade DisplayStyle afeta apenas a célula actual.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: The behavior and appearance of the drop-down arrow in the cells is indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.FlatStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O comportamento e o aspeto da seta pendente nas células é indicada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.FlatStyle%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To enable cell highlighting when the mouse pointer is over a cell, you must set the DisplayStyle property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.FlatStyle%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Para ativar a célula realce quando o ponteiro do rato está sobre uma célula, tem de definir a propriedade DisplayStyle e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle>a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.FlatStyle%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.FlatStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyle%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Obter ou definir esta propriedade obtém ou define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyle%2A>propriedade do objeto devolvido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyle%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Definição desta propriedade também define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyle%2A>apresentar a coluna de propriedade de cada célula na coluna e as atualizações.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para as células individuais, defina os valores das células depois de definir o valor de coluna.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle"></xref> value indicating the combo box appearance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle"> </xref> valor que indica o aspecto da caixa de combinação.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>propriedade é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle*> property value applies only to the current cell in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control when the current cell is in this column.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle*>valor da propriedade só se aplica a célula actual no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controlar quando a célula actual é nesta coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle*>

trans-unit.source: If the DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly property value is `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A> property affects all cells in the column; otherwise, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A> property affects only the current cell.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor da propriedade DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly `false`, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A>propriedade afeta todas as células na coluna; caso contrário, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A>propriedade afeta apenas a célula actual.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A> property affects the appearance of cells in the column when they are not in edit mode, and regardless of whether they are read-only.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A>propriedade afeta o aspecto das células na coluna quando são não em modo de edição e independentemente de estarem só de leitura.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a cell is in edit mode, it always looks like a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> control.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma célula está no modo de edição, sempre aspeto que tem um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Obter ou definir esta propriedade obtém ou define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly%2A>propriedade do objeto devolvido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Definição desta propriedade também define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly%2A>apresentar a coluna de propriedade de cada célula na coluna e as atualizações.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DisplayStyleForCurrentCellOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para as células individuais, defina os valores das células depois de definir o valor de coluna.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the display style applies only to the current cell; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o estilo de apresentação aplica-se apenas à célula actual; caso contrário <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>propriedade é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the drop-down lists of the combo boxes.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a largura das listas pendentes da combinação de caixas.

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DropDownWidth%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> member.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade corresponde de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DropDownWidth%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>Membro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DropDownWidth%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DropDownWidth%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Obter ou definir esta propriedade obtém ou define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DropDownWidth%2A>propriedade do objeto devolvido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DropDownWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DropDownWidth%2A> property of every cell in the column.
trans-unit.target: Definição desta propriedade também define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DropDownWidth%2A>a propriedade de cada célula da coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.DropDownWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para as células individuais, defina os valores das células depois de definir o valor de coluna.

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the drop-down lists.
trans-unit.target: A largura, em pixels, das listas pendentes.

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é 1.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>propriedade é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the flat style appearance of the column's cells.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o aspecto do estilo simples das células da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The FlatStyle property affects the behavior and appearance of the drop-down arrows for the cells in this column.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade FlatStyle afeta o comportamento e o aspecto das setas pendente das células nesta coluna.

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_2015](~/add/includes/net-2015-md.md)], when the FlatStyle property is set to `Flat` or `Popup` the drop-down arrows are resized according to the system DPI settings when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ``` To enable cell highlighting when the mouse pointer is over a cell, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle> and the FlatStyle property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Iniciando com o [!INCLUDE[net_2015](~/add/includes/net-2015-md.md)], quando a propriedade FlatStyle está definida como `Flat` ou `Popup` as setas pendente são redimensionadas, de acordo com as definições do sistema DPI quando o ficheiro App. config contém a seguinte entrada: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ``` para ativar a célula realce quando o ponteiro do rato está sobre uma célula, tem de definir a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A>propriedade e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle>a propriedade FlatStyle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxDisplayStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Obter ou definir esta propriedade obtém ou define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A>propriedade do objeto devolvido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Definição desta propriedade também define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A>apresentar a coluna de propriedade de cada célula na coluna e as atualizações.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para as células individuais, defina os valores das células depois de definir o valor de coluna.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref> value indicating the cell appearance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"> </xref> valor que indica o aspecto de célula.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>propriedade é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of objects used as selections in the combo boxes.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a colecção de objectos utilizados como selecções nas caixas de combinação.

trans-unit.source: This property returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade devolve o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.Items%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>devolvido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Items or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> properties are used to populate the selections of the combo boxes.
trans-unit.target: Os itens ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>propriedades são utilizadas para preencher as selecções das caixas de combinação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: If strings are added to Items, then the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> properties do not need to be set because each string added will be used for both value and display.
trans-unit.target: Se as cadeias são adicionadas aos itens de, em seguida, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>Propriedades não precisam de ser definida porque cada cadeia adicionada será utilizada para o valor e apresentar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.ValueMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn> does not support the use of multiple items with identical display values.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn>não suporta a utilização de vários itens com valores de apresentação idênticas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A> property is set, then Items cannot be used.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>for definida, em seguida, itens não podem ser utilizados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.ObjectCollection> that represents the selections in the combo boxes.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.ObjectCollection>que representa as selecções nas caixas de combinação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.ObjectCollection>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>propriedade é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of items in the drop-down list of the cells in the column.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o número máximo de itens na lista pendente das células na coluna.

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.MaxDropDownItems%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Obter ou definir esta propriedade obtém ou define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.MaxDropDownItems%2A>propriedade do objeto devolvido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.MaxDropDownItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.MaxDropDownItems%2A> property of every cell in the column.
trans-unit.target: Definição desta propriedade também define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.MaxDropDownItems%2A>a propriedade de cada célula da coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.MaxDropDownItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para as células individuais, defina os valores das células depois de definir o valor de coluna.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of drop-down list items, from 1 to 100.
trans-unit.target: O número máximo de itens na lista pendente, de 1 a 100.

trans-unit.source: The default is 8.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é de 8.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>propriedade é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the items in the combo box are sorted.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se os itens na caixa de combinação são ordenados.

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.Sorted%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Obter ou definir esta propriedade obtém ou define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.Sorted%2A>propriedade do objeto devolvido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.Sorted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.Sorted%2A> property of every cell in the column.
trans-unit.target: Definição desta propriedade também define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.Sorted%2A>a propriedade de cada célula da coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.Sorted%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para as células individuais, defina os valores das células depois de definir o valor de coluna.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the combo box is sorted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a caixa de combinação é ordenada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>propriedade é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma cadeia que descreve a coluna.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que descreve a coluna.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string that specifies the property or column from which to get values that correspond to the selections in the drop-down list.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma cadeia que especifica a propriedade ou coluna a partir da qual pode obter valores que correspondem às selecções na lista pendente.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A> for more information about its relationship with ValueMember.
trans-unit.target: Consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>para obter mais informações sobre a respetiva relação com ValueMember.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DisplayMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A> property is set to a string array, the ValueMember property does not need to be set because each string in the array will be used as a valid display string and as a valid underlying value.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>propriedade está definida como uma matriz de cadeia, a propriedade ValueMember tem de ser definida porque cada cadeia na matriz vai ser utilizada como uma cadeia de apresentação válido e como um valor válido de subjacente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.ValueMember%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Obter ou definir esta propriedade obtém ou define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.ValueMember%2A>propriedade do objeto devolvido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.ValueMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.ValueMember%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Definição desta propriedade também define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.ValueMember%2A>apresentar a coluna de propriedade de cada célula na coluna e as atualizações.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell.ValueMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para as células individuais, defina os valores das células depois de definir o valor de coluna.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that specifies the name of a property or column used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource*> property.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que especifica o nome de uma propriedade ou coluna utilizada no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.DataSource*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>propriedade é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>
